title: Roundabout
creator_credit: Igloo Films, 3rd Pictures, Jason Byrne, Louise Smith and Rachel Griffiths
brief_description: A stressed businessman experiences a panic attack after he hits a dog in his car on his way to work. Spiralling out of control he drives in endless circles, unable to stop. Photography, Tristan Milani ; music, David Bridie ; editing, Geordie Anderson. Cast: David Roberts, Alison Whyte, Kym Gyngell.
